recoil_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to all recoil, changing its magnitude

aim_interpolation_speed.description: Speed used to rotate the aim position. Is modified by weapon and customizations.

sway_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to all sway, changing its magnitude

sway_frequency_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to all sway, changing its frequency

correct_world_aim_position.description: [bool]If set, correct the world aim position with a raycast into the world. This ensures we match the weapon direction to what we hit with crosshair, and so only really matters for avatar.

world_aim_position_as_target.description: [bool]If set, use the world aim position as the target instead of the aim position.

aim_use_interpolation.description: [bool]True if we should use Aim Rotation Speed to rotate the aim position.

use_animation_recoil.description: [bool]Will send a fire animation event each time you fire the weapon with an animation variable (recoil_amount) which decreases over time.
